<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby & Wordpress
</h1>

This is an app i made it using gatsby as front end and wordpress ass back end & hosted at netlify to use hooks of wordpress & netlify
each time there is new post is published 
***Note***
Don't forget to modify a function.php at wordpress theme and add action trigger when new post published using add_action function of wordpress (i forget to add a function.php, maybe later) so happy programming ;)
